text: Nguye Owanidalayo ngothuli, emva koko ngeqabaza lembewu yomntu, emva koko ngehlwili elinamathelayo; emva koko Unikhuphela ngaphandle ningabantwana, Aphinde Aniphucule nifikelele ebuntwini, Niphinde nibe ngamaxhego. Ukanti phakathi kwenu kukho abo bathatyathwa bafe phambi (koko) khona ukuze nifikelele kwithuba elithile; mhlawumbi niya kuyisebenzisa ingqiqo
